conclusion: Plan to analyze image and reason about shadow changes due to light source movement.
Four objects on a stone surface: baseball, apple, small round object, microphone, each casting distinct shadows labeled A, B, C, D.
Small round object casts shadow C.
Shadows will shift to the right when the light source moves to the right.
Size of shadows will increase due to light source moving closer, increasing angle of incidence.
Shadows A, B, C, and D will all move to the right.
Size of each shadow will increase due to light source's new position.
Shadows will move to the right and become larger.
Final answer: Shadows A, B, C, and D will move to the right and increase in size.
